summary: In a strange city where every person seems content beyond reason a new man arrives in town and stirs up trouble by asking too many questions.
cast: Trond Fausa|Petronella Barker|Per Schaanning|Birgitte Larsen|Johannes Joner|Ellen Horn|Anders T. Andersen|Sigve Bøe|Hanne Lindbæk|Ivar Lykke|Aldun G. Magnaes|Mette K. Haugen|Hanne Dieserud|Gard Petersen|Benny Glaerum|Jan Egil Engnes|Dag Håvard Engebråten|Jo Strømgren|Johns Kristensen|Annette Teilstad|Anders Kartomten|Kirsten Grimstad|Jørgen Storm Rosenberg|Sverre Tofte|Jan Tore Abrahamsen|Tanja Dahlø|Per-Kaare Svendsen|Severin Roald|Svanur Ivarsson|Bjørn Jenseg
title: Den brysomme mannen
